casebody.data:
Fadi AL-MAQALEH, et al., petitioners,
v.
Chuck HAGEL, Secretary of Defense, et al. No. 14M21. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 6, 2014.

Opinion

Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis without affidavits of indigency executed by petitioners granted.

Justice KAGANtook no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.
